name: Official FBG "I Love My Shade" Tee
description:
DESCRIPTION: A shirt with the words "I Love My Shade" on the front. The word "love" is red repeated in cursive forming the shape of a heart.

This design is available in the form of a:
*White short-sleeved tee with black lettering.
*Black short sleeved tee with white lettering


Attention! If you live in or around the Baltimore area (local), message me BEFORE CHECKOUT for a discounted shipping code and/or to arrange a pick up. Email Kay at forbrowngirls@yahoo.com
